mapper.select: SELECT bin_to_uuid(card_id,1) as card_id, card_name, card_nickname, card_number, status, pin_number, card_amount, created_at, updated_at FROM STAR_CARD WHERE card_number = #{cardNumber} AND pin_number = #{pinNumber} AND status != 'DELETED'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG_CARD (member_id, card_id) VALUES (uuid_to_bin(#{memberId},1), uuid_to_bin(#{cardId},1))
INSERT INTO MEMBERS (name, login_id, password, tel, email, birth, nick_name, gender) VALUES (#{name}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{nickName}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT bin_to_uuid(member_id,1) as member_id, name, login_id, password, tel, email, status, birth, created_at, updated_at, nick_name, gender FROM MEMBERS WHERE member_id = uuid_to_bin(#{memberId},1)

SELECT bin_to_uuid(member_id,1) as member_id, name, login_id, password, tel, email, status, birth, created_at, updated_at, nick_name, gender FROM MEMBERS WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND password = #{password} AND status != 'DELETED'
